colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb Module¶

Xtreme RGB Colourspace¶

Defines the Xtreme RGB colourspace:

  • XTREME_RGB_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]HutchColor. (n.d.). XtremeRGB (4 K). Retrieved from http://www.hutchcolor.com/profiles/XtremeRGB.zip
colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb.XTREME_RGB_PRIMARIES = array([[ 1., 0.], [ 0., 1.], [ 0., 0.]])¶

Xtreme RGB colourspace primaries.

XTREME_RGB_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb.XTREME_RGB_ILLUMINANT = 'D50'¶

Xtreme RGB colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

XTREME_RGB_WHITEPOINT : unicode

colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb.XTREME_RGB_WHITEPOINT = array([ 0.3457, 0.3585])¶

Xtreme RGB colourspace whitepoint.

XTREME_RGB_WHITEPOINT : ndarray

colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb.XTREME_RGB_TO_XYZ_MATRIX = array([[ 0.96429568, 0. , 0. ], [ 0. , 1. , 0. ], [ 0. , 0. , 0.8251046 ]])¶

Xtreme RGB colourspace to CIE XYZ tristimulus values matrix.

XTREME_RGB_TO_XYZ_MATRIX : array_like, (3, 3)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.xtreme_rgb.XYZ_TO_XTREME_RGB_MATRIX = array([[ 1.03702632, 0. , 0. ], [ 0. , 1. , 0. ], [ 0. , 0. , 1.21196755]])¶
